text: Meall Dearg, meaning 'Red Hill' in Gaelic, may refer to several peaks in Scotland: * Meall Dearg (Aonach Eagach), a 953 m Munro forming the western end of the Aonach Eagach * Meall Dearg (Perth and Kinross), a 690 m Graham and Marilyn above Glen Cochill in Perth and Kinross; see List of Grahams (mountains)
title: Meall Dearg
